name: PrimalMyst Core Thematic Hexagon
description: The fundamental six-point structure that organizes all major game systems, with damage types, gods, realms, and character attributes arranged in a thematic hexagon starting from Cold at the top and proceeding clockwise. This system defines the available bonuses that players can choose to gain through divine trials.

center.description: The cosmic World Tree that connects all six realms and channels all divine power. Yggdrasil's six great branches each anchor one realm, while the tree's structure itself embodies the perfect balance of the hexagonal cosmic order.

attribute_layer.description: Pure Primal Fire: +5 Strength per level

defensive_layer.description: Primal Fire grants resistance to fire damage and elemental resistance affinity

offensive_layer.description: Primal Fire grants increased fire damage effectiveness

conflicts: Pure physical builds oppose preservation magic
Energy Shield directly countered by physical armor penetration

attribute_layer.description: Pure Primal Chaos: +5 Constitution per level

defensive_layer.description: Sovereign Physical grants resistance to physical damage and armor affinity

offensive_layer.description: Sovereign Physical grants increased physical damage and action speed

synergies: Int/Dex builds for chaos magic with evasion
ES/Evasion hybrid for survivability through unpredictability
conflicts: Pure strength builds oppose chaotic transformation

attribute_layer.description: Pure Primal Lightning: +5 Dexterity per level

defensive_layer.description: Primal Lightning grants resistance to lightning damage and elemental resistance affinity

offensive_layer.description: Primal Lightning grants increased lightning damage effectiveness

synergies: Dex/Int builds (lightning+chaos) for speed and unpredictability
conflicts: Intelligence-based energy shields oppose pure speed

attribute_layer.description: Pure Primal Physical: +5 Wisdom per level

defensive_layer.description: Sovereign Radiance grants resistance to radiance damage and energy shield affinity

offensive_layer.description: Sovereign Radiance grants increased radiance damage and spell effectiveness

synergies: Dex/Str builds for mobile physical combat
Armor mastery for enhanced physical defense
conflicts: Intelligence-based magic opposes direct physical approach
Pure energy shields vulnerable to physical penetration

attribute_layer.description: Pure Primal Cold: +5 Intelligence per level

defensive_layer.description: Primal Cold grants resistance to cold damage and elemental resistance affinity

offensive_layer.description: Primal Cold grants increased cold damage effectiveness

synergies: Str/Int builds (fire+cold) for fundamental force mastery
conflicts: Chaotic magic opposes fire's transformative order
Evasive techniques conflict with fire's direct approach

attribute_layer.description: Pure Sovereign Chaos: +5 Charisma per level

defensive_layer.description: Sovereign Chaos grants resistance to chaos damage and evasion affinity

offensive_layer.description: Sovereign Chaos grants increased chaos damage and damage over time effects

synergies: Str/Int builds for paladin-like light warriors
Armor/ES hybrid for maximum protection and magical power
conflicts: Pure dexterity builds oppose radiance's protective stance
Evasive techniques conflict with energy shield's direct protection

hexagon_dynamics.adjacency_bonuses: Adjacent elements provide natural synergies - combining their damage types, attributes, or defense styles creates powerful hybrid builds. Players specializing in adjacent corners gain bonus effectiveness when using both elements together.
hexagon_dynamics.opposition_tensions: Opposite elements create meaningful choices and build diversity. While direct opposition doesn't prevent combination, it requires more investment and planning. Opposite builds excel in different situations, creating rock-paper-scissors dynamics.
hexagon_dynamics.full_cycle_effects: Characters that successfully incorporate elements from all six corners gain access to 'World Tree Mastery' - special abilities that channel Yggdrasil's full power. These builds are extremely challenging but offer unique endgame possibilities.

damage_progression.description: Damage types flow around the hexagon in elemental order
damage_progression.sequence: Cold → Chaos → Lightning → Physical → Fire → Radiance → Cold
damage_progression.mechanical_note: Adjacent damage types have natural combination bonuses

divine_hierarchy.description: Gods are arranged by their cosmic roles and power relationships
divine_hierarchy.balance_note: Fundamental and Primal gods alternate around the hexagon

attribute_flow.description: Core attributes transition smoothly around the hexagon
attribute_flow.primary_sequence: Int → Int → Dex → Dex → Str → Str → Int
attribute_flow.hybrid_sequence: None → Int/Dex → None → Dex/Str → None → Str/Int → None
attribute_flow.build_note: Pure attribute builds occupy positions 1, 3, 5; hybrid builds at 2, 4, 6

defense_progression.description: Defense types flow to create natural build paths
defense_progression.sequence: Elemental Resistance → Evasion → Elemental Resistance → Armor → Elemental Resistance → Energy Shield → Elemental Resistance
defense_progression.strategic_note: Fundamental gods grant elemental resistance; Primal gods grant specialized defenses (evasion, armor, energy shield)

tree_structure.cosmic_balance: Three Fundamental gods in the crown provide foundation; three Primal gods in middle branches provide active influence

branch_connections.description: Each branch connects to its adjacent branches through mystical pathways
branch_connections.travel_mechanics: Easier to travel between adjacent realms; opposite realms require special preparation
branch_connections.power_flow: Divine power flows most easily between adjacent branches

character_builds.pure_builds: Focus on one corner for maximum specialization in that element
character_builds.adjacent_builds: Combine two adjacent corners for powerful synergy builds
character_builds.opposite_builds: Combine opposite corners for unique challenge builds with special benefits
character_builds.full_spectrum: Attempt to incorporate all six corners for ultimate mastery builds

equipment_design.single_focus: Equipment that strongly enhances one corner
equipment_design.opposition_resolution: Rare equipment that helps resolve opposite corner conflicts
equipment_design.world_tree_items: Legendary equipment that draws from multiple corners

content_organization.realm_content: Each of the six realms provides content themed around its corner
content_organization.cross_realm: Special content that requires understanding of multiple corners
content_organization.cosmic_events: Events that rotate around the hexagon, emphasizing different corners

lore_integration.mythological_basis: The hexagon reflects the cosmic structure of Yggdrasil and the divine hierarchy of the Eldritch Pantheon. Each corner represents both a fundamental force of reality and an active divine influence.
lore_integration.cosmic_significance: This six-fold structure is the fundamental organizing principle of the PrimalMyst universe. Understanding the hexagon allows Myst-Walkers to comprehend the true nature of reality and divine power.
lore_integration.divine_connections: The alternating pattern of Fundamental and Primal gods around the hexagon represents the flow of cosmic power from ancient, foundational forces through active divine influence to mortal practitioners.
